mapper.select: SELECT u.EMP_NAME, u.EMP_AUTH , u.EMP_CODE, u.EMP_GENDER, u.EMP_USE, u.EMP_TEL FROM USER_INFO u LEFT JOIN LOCATION l ON u.AREA_CODE= l.AREA_CODE

SELECT EMP_CODE, l.AREA , EMP_NAME, EMP_GENDER, EMP_USE, EMP_IMG, CASE WHEN SUBSTR(EMP_AUTH,1,2)='CL' THEN '거래처관리' WHEN SUBSTR(EMP_AUTH,1,2)='SY' THEN '시스템관리' ELSE '재고관리' END AS EMP_AUTH , EMP_TEL ,EMP_ADDR FROM USER_INFO LEFT JOIN LOCATION l USING (AREA_CODE) WHERE EMP_CODE=#{emp_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER_INFO (EMP_CODE, AREA_CODE, EMP_NAME, EMP_PW, EMP_GENDER, EMP_USE, EMP_IMG, EMP_AUTH, EMP_TEL, EMP_ADDR) VALUES(#{emp_code}, #{area_code}, #{emp_name}, #{emp_pw}, #{emp_gender}, 'Y', NULL, #{emp_auth}, #{emp_tel}, #{emp_addr})
